com.myscript.atk.scw

Interface SingleCharWidgetApi.OnGestureListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    SingleCharWidgetApi

    public static interface SingleCharWidgetApi.OnGestureListener
    Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked when gestures are detected.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBackspaceGesture(int count)
      Called when a backspace gesture is detected.
      boolean onLongPressGesture(float x, float y)
      Called when a long press gesture is detected.
      void onPinchGesture(float x, float y)
      Called when a pinch-in gesture is detected.
      void onReturnGesture()
      Called when a return gesture is detected.
      boolean onSingleTapGesture(float x, float y)
      Called when a single tap gesture is detected.

    • Method Detail

      • onSingleTapGesture

        boolean onSingleTapGesture(float x,
                         float y)
        Called when a single tap gesture is detected.

        The application may choose to take action when a single tap gesture is detected, in this case this callback shall return true to indicate that it handled the event.

        If this callback returns false, then the single tap gesture is considered by the widget as a genuine dot and passed to the handwriting recognizer.

        Parameters:
        x - X position of the single tap in widget coordinates.
        y - Y position of the single tap in widget coordinates.
        Returns:
        true if single tap event is handled, false otherwise (indicates a handwritten dot).

      • onLongPressGesture

        boolean onLongPressGesture(float x,
                         float y)
        Called when a long press gesture is detected.

        The application may choose to take action when a long press gesture is detected, in this case this callback shall return true to indicate that it handled the event and the current stroke is cancelled.

        If this callback returns false, then the long press gesture is discarded by the widget and the widget resumes capturing the current stroke.

        Parameters:
        x - X position of the long press in widget coordinates.
        y - Y position of the long press in widget coordinates.

      • onBackspaceGesture

        void onBackspaceGesture(int count)
        Called when a backspace gesture is detected.

        The gesture should be applied at the current insert index.

        Parameters:
        count - Number of consecutive detected backspace gestures.
        See Also:
        SingleCharWidgetApi.getInsertIndex(), SingleCharWidgetApi.replaceCharacters(int, int, String)

      • onReturnGesture

        void onReturnGesture()
        Called when a return gesture is detected.

        The gesture should be applied at the current insert index.

        See Also:
        SingleCharWidgetApi.getInsertIndex(), SingleCharWidgetApi.replaceCharacters(int, int, String)

      • onPinchGesture

        void onPinchGesture(float x,
                  float y)
        Called when a pinch-in gesture is detected.
